name: Tnanks (DEMO Version)
description:
=======================================

=======================================

BACKSTORY

Tnanks is a game I developed back in July 2015, as a variation on the classic multiplayer tank-based battle game. All of my friends were playing a version of that game at the time, and I wanted to see if I was able to put together my own version. Programmed by a fourteen year-old to impress their friends, Tnanks came to be.

I managed to write a good deal of lore, and make it at least somewhat playable before giving up on it completely. I originally planned to release it under LantixPro Studios, but obviously that never happened. Now, seven years later, I'm posting it alongside some of my older works that I am proud of.

Thank you for checking it out.

=======================================

TNANKS Welcome back to the world's favorite competition: Tnanks!

I'll be your host, AVA, or Advanced Videotainment Android.

For those of you who have never heard of Tnanks, Tnanks is a competitive game taking place in space.

Each country, and a few surprise guests, send a soldier to represent them. The representatives go and win cash prizes and glory.

Use the arrow keys to control your soldier. Hold and release space to fire projectiles. Become the last soldier standing to win cash prizes and advance to the next round.

Remember, everyone dies in the end.

=======================================
